title: Allergies? Try one of these 'unreal' air purifiers — up to 43 percent off, off today only
text:
Yahoo Lifestyle is committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. We may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

Airthereal's Day Dawning air purifier is as quiet as a whisper. (Photo: Amazon) More

Want to breathe easier? Consider an air purifier — and today only, two highly rated models are on sale! Airthereal’s Day Dawning air purifier, $36 (from $50), is best for small rooms (up to 110 square feet) and uses a HEPA filter to remove particles to relieve allergy symptoms with barely any noise. It’s only two and a half pounds, so you can bring it from room to room and place it bedside when it’s time to snooze. It also features a carbon filter to absorb smoke and odors.

“Well, this is really unreal!” raves a fan. “Probably the BEST air purifier I have owned. Trust me, I have owned many. I suffer from asthma and allergies. Using this particular one these last two weeks or so, I’m totally feeling a difference. The air quality is very different in my room. Note that this will work best for smaller rooms. This also looks super futuristic and beautiful! The lighting on it is so cool! And in general it is quite simple to use...”

Shop it: Airthereal Day Dawning Air Purifier ADH50B, $36 (was $50), amazon.com

For larger rooms up to 355 square feet, Airthereal’s Pure Morning air purifier, $74 (was $130), will do the trick. According to the company, you’ll notice a difference in just 10 minutes. And this guy will sense your particular predicament; just press “Smart Control” and it’ll measure your home’s air quality and choose the perfect setting. No need to figure out when to change the filter either; it’ll tell you.

View photos Airthereal's Pure Morning Air Purifier. (Photo: Amazon) More

Says a self-proclaimed customer for life: “Due to water damage from the hurricane last year, which has been repaired, the air quality in my home seemed to be very poor. The last few months, anyone who came to visit complained about not feeling well while here or after they left, just like my family. I ordered two of the air purifiers and was shocked to see the readings. Air quality should be 12 or less to be in a healthy range. One area of my home was 116 and another was 59. Within 45 minutes, the 116 reading had dropped into the 20’s and now, a few hours later, both machines are reading 8 or less! Needless to say I called a remediation company today! I’m thankful to have the machines keep our home safer until the problem can be found, but I will continue to use them afterwards as well. I’ll be a lifelong customer. Thank you Airthereal!”

Shop it: Airthereal Pure Morning Air Purifier APH260, $74 (was $130), amazon.com

The reviews quoted above reflect the most recent versions at the time of publication.
